job-description:
Minimum Qualifications
Master's degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, Engineering, applied science, or equivalent practical experience.
5 years of experience in quantitative analytics, marketing analytics, statistical modeling, machine learning, digital attribution, forecasting, and/or predictive analytics.
Experience in media programming in Python and/or R.
Ability to speak and write in English and Mandarin fluently and idiomatically.


Preferred Qualifications
Experience working with SQL and Big Data.
Experience delivering bespoke analytics to stakeholders (e.g., problem scoping/definition, modeling, interpretation, presentation).
Experience using and/or deploying digital analytics and measurement solutions.
Knowledge and ability to comfortably work with statistical programming languages (e.g., R, Python, TensorFlow).
Ability to visualize models and results.
Ability to debug and troubleshoot code and models.

Responsibilities
Lead analytics aspects of client engagements in the areas of marketing effectiveness and marketing portfolio management, with deep understanding of modeling.
Effectively work with clients to align Google Analytics suite attribution and analytic solutions with key organizational challenges. Develop value-based roadmaps to solve client business challenges on a continuous and repeataborate with clients to build an end-to-end Machine Learning framework. Engage various stakeholders, assess data readiness and be able to scale a proof-of-concept to a larger solution.
Work with clients and internal teams to translate data and model results into tactical and strategic insights. Co-present to and work with clients to integrate recommendations into business processes.
Collaborate with Product/Engineering teams to increase and optimize capabilities, employing methods which create opportunities for scale, proactively helping to drive innovation.
